WRITING.TITLE: 2070 or 2080 (Super?)
WRITING.TEXT: I #8217;m currently trying to pick which gpu I should start saving money for, but I don #8217;t want to over spend for the 120hz on the index. Which should I get, a rtx 2070, rtx 2080, or rtx 280 super (no 2080ti cause holy shit that expense) Edit: I thank you all for the help, I decided on the rtx 2070 super. I start saving once I #8217;m done saving for an index
700 bucks is a lot of money though, I don #8217;t know if I should save that up, or just get the cheaper rtx 2070 super
Aren #8217;t used GPUs know to be unreliable
Great to hear that, I #8217;ll think I made my mind up. I #8217;m getting the rtx 2070. The 2080 super is just way to much.
Both are very expensive, plus I already made up my mind. Rtx 2070 super is fine enough
What vr games do you have, I am curious

WRITING.TITLE: Steam wallet support removed????
WRITING.TEXT: So I have been saving up money for a valve index for about 3 months. I been using steam wallet code because I don #8217;t have any credit cards. However, when I tried to check the price of everything (tax), there is a pop up that says that steam wallet is not a valid payment method. You can check yourself too, just try to buy a valve index, and the same thing happens. Now I #8217;m sitting with 578 dollars in my steam wallet that I can #8217;t use towards a valve index, and now I #8217;m very very pissed off. Edit: Also, I #8217;m pretty sure this is against the steam subscriber agree that they made, cause in section 3, it #8217;s states that steam wallet can be used on hardware Possible theories: 1) it could be an error when I don #8217;t have enough steam wallet funds, but that would t make sense cause it would probably get me to pay the rest off with a credit card 2) funds from the market place Edit 2: currently still waiting on a response from steam support. Here #8217;s how you can help, send steam support a ticket, but also mention their steam subscriber agreement, and how that steam wallet can be used on hardware. If we make enough tickets, we will more than likely gain a response faster. Edit3: Finally got a reply, and it is indeed no longer possible to buy a valve index with steam wallet credit. That mean they are not following their own steam subscriber agreement. This is complete bullshit
Do you know if it #8217;s possible to combine multiple prepaid credit cards on pay pal, cause if I need to start over (hope to god I don #8217;t) that #8217;s the payment method I would go for
I would explain, but it #8217;s a little embarrassing
I live in New Jersey, so I have no idea why it won #8217;t work?
Do you think a prepaid visa gift card could work???
No I don #8217;t, do you think a prepaid visa would work
Actually, when I first used steam (around 2012) before they had their own gift cards, I used a visa gift card to buy portal 2, so I think it will work
Actually, when I first used steam (around 2012) before they had their own gift cards, I used a visa gift card to buy portal 2, so I think it will work
I #8217;m having the exact same issue, looks like they removed support
It didn #8217;t work for me and another person who tried using 100 dollars of it, and his PayPal
Which is even worse since it goes against their OWN steam subscriber agreement (check section 3 to see what I mean) Btw, what the heck is webpay
Doing the same as well, will update the post or make a new one when I get a response
If it #8217;s similar to the vive wands, it #8217;s pressing the menu button and the trigger at the same time
I don #8217;t own one, but I guess so idk

WRITING.TITLE: Psa: you can no longer buy a valve index with steam wallet

WRITING.TEXT: So yeah, this is just complete bullshit, they are not following their own god damn subscriber agreement
The only thing we can really do to fix this is quote the steam subscriber agreement, which clearly states that steam wallet credit can be used on hardware
What sucks the most is that I had 578 dollars saved up for it, and now I can #8217;t use it for the valve index
I thank you for finding the quote, now just send tickets and spam this idk.
